>> % Loaded the coefficents of each value in front of each of the x's into Matrix M
>> % Loaded all the values of the average temperatures into the vector avg
>> 
>> M(1:6,1:6) % First six rows of our matrix M for proof

ans =

   1.000000000000000                   0   1.000000000000000                   0   1.000000000000000                   0

>> avg(1:6) % First six values of the avg temp vector for proof

ans =

   9.400000000000000
   8.600000000000000
   8.650000000000000
   7.800000000000000

  14.449999999999999

>> x = M\avg % This solves the system of linear equations of M*x = avg

x =

  10.812647383457655
   0.000045832487349
   2.749264338945697
   5.439851339922091
   0.003612699847815
  -0.218174227447990
